clusters.title: Staff hid young children at Queensland childcare centre during police incident
clusters.neutral_headline: Man Breaks Into Childcare Centre, Children Hidden

items.title: Staff hid young children at Queensland childcare centre during police incident
items.standfirst: Five staff and six young children were on site at a Sunshine Coast childcare centre yesterday evening when a man broke into the building with serious self-inflicted injuries.
items.content: Five staff and six young children were on site at a Sunshine Coast childcare centre yesterday evening when a man broke into the building with serious self-inflicted injuries.Emergency services were called to the Peregian Springs Habitat Early Learning Centre about 6pm after the 28-year-old man smashed his way through the front door.Officers attempted to negotiate with him before taking him into custody. READ MORE: iiNet cyberattack exposes details of 280,000 customersHe became unresponsive soon after.Police at the scene rendered first aid before other emergency services arrived, but he was declared dead a short time later.No other person present at the time of the incident was physically harmed.Meanwhile, the staff had locked themselves into a room with the children. "The staff at the childcare centre acted remarkably professionally and protected the children who were there," Sunshine Coast Detective Acting Inspector Scott Wiggins said.The death is under investigation by the Ethical Standards Command on behalf of the state coroner and is under independent oversight by the Crime and Corruption Commission.Anyone with information should call 131 444, or make an online report. Readers seeking support can contact Lifeline on 13 11 14 or beyond blue on 1300 22 4636.DOWNLOAD THE 9NEWS APP: Stay across all the latest in breaking news, sport, politics and the weather via our news app and get notifications sent straight to your smartphone. Available on the Apple App Store and Google Play.

items.title: Six children hidden as man smashed way into childcare centre
items.standfirst: The police Ethical Standards Command is investigating the death of a man at a childcare centre on Queensland's Sunshine Coast.
items.content: The police Ethical Standards Command is investigating the death of a man at a childcare centre on Queensland's Sunshine Coast.

clusters.ai_summary:
• A man broke into a childcare center.
• Six children were hidden during the incident.
• Five staff members were also on site.
• The incident occurred on the Sunshine Coast.
• Police are investigating the man's death.
